careers.title: HVAC Technician
careers.whyThis: HVAC Technician will help you build your Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards HVAC Technician you still need inquiry skills like planning & conducting, processing & analysing data. You also need a bit more knowledge in Physical Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what HVAC Technician involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see HVAC Technician now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: Surveying Technician
careers.whyThis: Surveying Technician will help you build your Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Surveying Technician you still need inquiry skills like planning & conducting, processing & analysing data. You also need a bit more knowledge in Physical Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Surveying Technician involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Surveying Technician now and understand what to work towards.

careers.title: Forensic Scientist
careers.whyThis: Forensic Scientist will help you build your Chemical Sciences and Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Forensic Scientist you still need inquiry skills like planning & conducting, processing & analysing data. You also need a bit more knowledge in Chemical Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Forensic Scientist involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Forensic Scientist now and understand what to work towards.
